## Sequential Feature Selection

```{r}
# DALToolbox Data Preprocessing
# version 1.0.777

#loading DAL
library(daltoolbox) 
library(daltoolboxdp)
```

### Example
General function for exploring Sequential feature selection

```{r}
iris <- datasets::iris
```

### Sequential Feature Selection

```{r}
# Initialize Sequential Feature Selector
select_model <- create_sequential_fs_model(
    n_neighbors=3, 
    direction="forward", 
    n_features_to_select=2
)

# Apply feature selection
X_selected <- fit_transform_fs(select_model, iris, "Species")

# Display results
cat("Original shape:", dim(iris), "\n")
cat("Shape after Sequential Selection:", dim(X_selected), "\n")
print(head(X_selected))
```
